EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM MongoDB and Spring: Two leaves of the same tree.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: MongoDB and Spring - Two leaves of the same tree
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar MongoDB and Spring: Two leaves of the same tree on Thursday, October 29, 2015.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, October 29, 2015 Time: 10:00AM PDT/5:00PM GMT
Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1059411/07164490EF1A47474F770C42A938312A> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
